testCases.name: Empty string
testCases.description: Empty string should be considered balanced

testCases.name: Single pair of parentheses
testCases.description: Simple pair of parentheses should be balanced

testCases.name: Single pair of brackets
testCases.description: Simple pair of square brackets should be balanced

testCases.name: Single pair of braces
testCases.description: Simple pair of curly braces should be balanced

testCases.name: Mixed balanced brackets
testCases.description: Mixed types of brackets in proper nesting should be balanced

testCases.name: Unmatched opening bracket
testCases.description: Missing closing bracket should be unbalanced

testCases.name: Unmatched closing bracket
testCases.description: Extra closing bracket should be unbalanced

testCases.name: Wrong order of brackets
testCases.description: Incorrectly nested brackets should be unbalanced

testCases.name: Complex nested structure
testCases.description: Complex but properly nested structure should be balanced
